SupernalAngels, devils, godsSupernal
AbyssalDemons, gnolls, sahuaginBarazhad

The gods have their own language, Supernal, which they share with their angelic servants. When a god or angel speaks Supernal, it can choose to speak so that any creatures that understand a language can understand this divine speech, as if the speaker used their own languages. Immortals that speak Supernal can understand speech and writing in any language.
    Adventurers do not normally know the Supernal and Abyssal languages to begin with.

Published in Rules Compendium, page(s) 69.
